details:
adjective
- (used of eyes) lacking liveliness
= synonyms: glassy
- having a shiny surface or coating
= example: having a shiny surface or coating
= synonyms: shiny
- fitted or covered with glass
= example: fitted or covered with glass
= synonyms: glassed
- (of foods) covered with a shiny coating by applying e.g. beaten egg or a sugar or gelatin mixture
= example: (of foods) covered with a shiny coating by applying e.g. beaten egg or a sugar or gelatin mixture
